34  public static $db;
35  public static $useTransformers = false;
36  public static $transformerOp = 'transform';
37  private static $conditionParsers = [ ];

47  public static function getManyToOne($instance, $member, $included = false, $useCache = NULL) {
48  $classname = self::getClass_ ( $instance );
49  if (is_array ( $instance )) {
50  $instance = self::getById ( $classname, $instance [1], false, $useCache );
51  }
52  $fieldAnnot = OrmUtils::getMemberJoinColumns ( $classname, $member );
53  if ($fieldAnnot !== null) {
54  $annotationArray = $fieldAnnot [1];
55  $member = $annotationArray ["member"];
56  $value = Reflexion::getMemberValue ( $instance, $member );
57  $key = OrmUtils::getFirstKey ( $annotationArray ["className"] );
58  $kv = array ($key => $value );
59  $obj = self::getById ( $annotationArray ["className"], $kv, $included, $useCache );
60  if ($obj !== null) {
61  Logger::info ( "DAO", "Loading the member " . $member . " for the object " . $classname, "getManyToOne" );
62  $accesseur = "set" . ucfirst ( $member );
63  if (is_object ( $instance ) && method_exists ( $instance, $accesseur )) {
64  $instance->$accesseur ( $obj );
65  $instance->_rest [$member] = $obj->_rest;
66  }
67  return $obj;
68  }
69  }
70  }
71 
81  public static function getOneToMany($instance, $member, $included = true, $useCache = NULL, $annot = null) {
82  $ret = array ();
83  $class = self::getClass_ ( $instance );
84  if (! isset ( $annot )) {
85  $annot = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $class, "#oneToMany", $member );
86  }
87  if ($annot !== false) {
88  $fkAnnot = OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember ( $annot ["className"], "#joinColumn", $annot ["mappedBy"] );
89  if ($fkAnnot !== false) {
90  $fkv = self::getFirstKeyValue_ ( $instance );
91  $ret = self::_getAll ( $annot ["className"], ConditionParser::simple ( $fkAnnot ["name"] . "= ?", $fkv ), $included, $useCache );
92  if (is_object ( $instance ) && $modifier = self::getAccessor ( $member, $instance, 'getOneToMany' )) {
93  self::setToMember ( $member, $instance, $ret, $modifier );
94  }
95  }
96  }
97  return $ret;
98  }
99 
110  public static function getManyToMany($instance, $member, $included = false, $array = null, $useCache = NULL) {
111  $ret = [ ];
112  $class = self::getClass_ ( $instance );
113  $parser = new ManyToManyParser ( $class, $member );
114  if ($parser->init ()) {
115  if (is_null ( $array )) {
116  $pk = self::getFirstKeyValue_ ( $instance );
117  $condition = " INNER JOIN `" . $parser->getJoinTable () . "` on `" . $parser->getJoinTable () . "`.`" . $parser->getFkField () . "`=`" . $parser->getTargetEntityTable () . "`.`" . $parser->getPk () . "` WHERE `" . $parser->getJoinTable () . "`.`" . $parser->getMyFkField () . "`= ?";
118  $ret = self::_getAll ( $parser->getTargetEntityClass (), ConditionParser::simple ( $condition, $pk ), $included, $useCache );
119  } else {
120  $ret = self::getManyToManyFromArray ( $instance, $array, $class, $parser );
121  }
122  if (is_object ( $instance ) && $modifier = self::getAccessor ( $member, $instance, 'getManyToMany' )) {
123  self::setToMember ( $member, $instance, $ret, $modifier );
124  }
125  }
126  return $ret;
127  }
128 
135  public static function affectsManyToManys($instance, $array = NULL, $useCache = NULL) {
136  $metaDatas = OrmUtils::getModelMetadata ( \get_class ( $instance ) );
137  $manyToManyFields = $metaDatas ["#manyToMany"];
138  if (\sizeof ( $manyToManyFields ) > 0) {
139  foreach ( $manyToManyFields as $member ) {
140  self::getManyToMany ( $instance, $member, false, $array, $useCache );
141  }
142  }
143  }
144 
155  public static function getAll($className, $condition = '', $included = true, $parameters = null, $useCache = NULL) {
156  return self::_getAll ( $className, new ConditionParser ( $condition, null, $parameters ), $included, $useCache );
157  }
158 
159  public static function paginate($className, $page = 1, $rowsPerPage = 20, $condition = null, $included = true) {
160  if (! isset ( $condition )) {
161  $condition = "1=1";
162  }
163  return self::getAll ( $className, $condition . " LIMIT " . $rowsPerPage . " OFFSET " . (($page - 1) * $rowsPerPage), $included );
164  }
165 
166  public static function getRownum($className, $ids) {
167  $tableName = OrmUtils::getTableName ( $className );
168  self::parseKey ( $ids, $className );
169  $condition = SqlUtils::getCondition ( $ids, $className );
170  $keyFields = OrmUtils::getKeyFields ( $className );
171  if (is_array ( $keyFields )) {
172  $keys = implode ( ",", $keyFields );
173  } else {
174  $keys = "1";
175  }
176  return self::$db->queryColumn ( "SELECT num FROM (SELECT *, @rownum:=@rownum + 1 AS num FROM `{$tableName}`, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r ORDER BY {$keys}) d WHERE " . $condition );
177  }
178 
187  public static function count($className, $condition = '', $parameters = null) {
188  $tableName = OrmUtils::getTableName ( $className );
189  if ($condition != '')
190  $condition = " WHERE " . $condition;
191  return self::$db->prepareAndFetchColumn ( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `" . $tableName . "`" . $condition, $parameters );
192  }
193 
204  public static function getOne($className, $condition, $included = true, $parameters = null, $useCache = NULL) {
205  $conditionParser = new ConditionParser ();
206  if (! isset ( $parameters )) {
207  $conditionParser->addKeyValues ( $condition, $className );
208  } elseif (! is_array ( $condition )) {
209  $conditionParser->setCondition ( $condition );
210  $conditionParser->setParams ( $parameters );
211  } else {
212  throw new DAOException ( "The \$keyValues parameter should not be an array if \$parameters is not null" );
213  }
214  return self::_getOne ( $className, $conditionParser, $included, $useCache );
215  }
216 
227  public static function getById($className, $keyValues, $included = true, $useCache = NULL) {
228  return self::_getOne ( $className, self::getConditionParser ( $className, $keyValues ), $included, $useCache );
229  }
230 
231  protected static function getConditionParser($className, $keyValues) {
232  if (! isset ( self::$conditionParsers [$className] )) {
233  $conditionParser = new ConditionParser ();
234  $conditionParser->addKeyValues ( $keyValues, $className );
235  self::$conditionParsers [$className] = $conditionParser;
236  } else {
237  self::$conditionParsers [$className]->setKeyValues ( $keyValues );
238  }
239  return self::$conditionParsers [$className];
240  }
241 
254  public static function connect($dbType, $dbName, $serverName = '127.0.0.1', $port = '3306', $user = 'root', $password = '', $options = [], $cache = false) {
255  self::$db = new Database ( $dbType, $dbName, $serverName, $port, $user, $password, $options, $cache );
256  try {
257  self::$db->connect ();
258  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
259  Logger::error ( "DAO", $e->getMessage () );
260  throw new DAOException ( $e->getMessage (), $e->getCode (), $e->getPrevious () );
261  }
262  }
263 
269  public static function startDatabase(&$config) {
270  $db = $config ['database'] ?? [ ];
271  if ($db ['dbName'] !== '') {
272  self::connect ( $db ['type'], $db ['dbName'], $db ['serverName'] ?? '127.0.0.1', $db ['port'] ?? 3306, $db ['user'] ?? 'root', $db ['password'] ?? '', $db ['options'] ?? [ ], $db ['cache'] ?? false);
273  }
274  }
275 
281  public static function isConnected() {
282  return self::$db !== null && (self::$db instanceof Database) && self::$db->isConnected ();
283  }
284 
290  public static function setTransformerOp($op) {
291  self::$transformerOp = $op;
292  }
293 
297  public static function closeDb() {
298  self::$db->close ();
299  }
